style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="160" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-Q-ppw3ikLaPJCo2a-yn-7"
